name: FAnimNode_CopyPoseFromMesh
doc: Simple controller to copy a bone's transform to another one.

SourceMeshComponent: This is used by default if it's valid
RootBoneToCopy: If you want to specify copy root, use this - this will ensure copy only below of this joint (inclusively)
bUseAttachedParent: If SourceMeshComponent is not valid, and if this is true, it will look for attahced parent as a source
bCopyCurves: Copy curves also from SouceMeshComponent. This will copy the curves if this instance also contains curve attributes
bUseMeshPose: Use root space transform to copy to the target pose. By default, it copies their relative transform (bone space)
